mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into movie_lib (name, english_name, directors, writer, actors, rate, style, country, language, date, duration, introduction, douban_id, url, pic, create_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doubanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update movie_lib set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, directors = #{directors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, writer = #{writer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actors = #{actors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, douban_id = #{doubanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, english_name, directors, writer, actors, rate, style, country, language, date, duration, introduction, douban_id, url, pic, create_time from movie_lib where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, english_name, directors, writer, actors, rate, style, country, language, date, duration, introduction, douban_id, url, pic, create_time from movie_lib
